channel.name: ADT_EVENT_SENDER

properties.select: SELECT bbevent_view.curdate AS bbevent_view_curdate, bbevent_view.bbevent_eid AS bbevent_view_bbevent_eid, bbevent_view.bbevent_hl7_event AS bbevent_view_bbevent_hl7_event, bbevent_view.bbevent_pid AS bbevent_view_bbevent_pid, bbevent_view.bbevent_vid AS bbevent_view_bbevent_vid, bbevent_view.bbevent_lid AS bbevent_view_bbevent_lid, bbevent_view.bbevent_modify_date AS bbevent_modify_date, bbevent_view.bbevent_from_dept AS bbevent_view_bbevent_from_dept, bbevent_view.bbevent_from_room AS bbevent_view_bbevent_from_room, bbevent_view.bbevent_from_bed AS bbevent_view_bbevent_from_bed, bbevent_view.patient_pid AS bbevent_view_patient_pid, bbevent_view.patient_mrn AS bbevent_view_patient_mrn, bbevent_view.patient_last_name AS bbevent_view_patient_last_name, bbevent_view.patient_first_name AS patient_first_name, bbevent_view.patient_birth_date AS patient_birth_date, bbevent_view.patient_sex_code AS bbevent_view_patient_sex_code, bbevent_view.patient_ethnic_code AS patient_ethnic_code, bbevent_view.patient_address AS bbevent_view_patient_address, bbevent_view.patient_city AS bbevent_view_patient_city, bbevent_view.patient_state_code AS patient_state_code, bbevent_view.patient_zip_code AS bbevent_view_patient_zip_code, bbevent_view.patient_home_phone AS patient_home_phone, bbevent_view.patient_work_phone AS patient_work_phone, bbevent_view.location_lid AS bbevent_view_location_lid, bbevent_view.location_pid AS bbevent_view_location_pid, bbevent_view.location_aid AS bbevent_view_location_aid, bbevent_view.location_dept AS bbevent_view_location_dept, bbevent_view.location_room AS bbevent_view_location_room, bbevent_view.location_bed AS bbevent_view_location_bed, bbevent_view.visit_vid AS bbevent_view_visit_vid, bbevent_view.visit_pid AS bbevent_view_visit_pid, bbevent_view.visit_patient_class AS visit_patient_class, bbevent_view.visit_admit_type AS bbevent_view_visit_admit_type, bbevent_view.visit_att_provnum AS bbevent_view_visit_att_provnum, bbevent_view.visit_att_provname AS visit_att_provname, bbevent_view.visit_hosp_service AS visit_hosp_service, bbevent_view.visit_visitnum AS bbevent_view_visit_visitnum, bbevent_view.visit_admitdate AS bbevent_view_visit_admitdate, bbevent_view.visit_dischdate AS bbevent_view_visit_dischdate FROM mirthdb.bbevent_view
properties.update: UPDATE mirthdb.iq_sub_bbevent SET msg_seq = ${bbevent_view_bbevent_eid} , modify_date = now();

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
channel.postprocessingScript: // This script executes once after a message has been processed return;
